channel.title: Website of Sam Passmore
channel.description: Recent content on Website of Sam Passmore

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I have given guest lectures for the following courses at the University of Bristol:

item.title: The problem with Galton's problem
item.description: The Problem with Galton’s Problem We need to talk about “Galton’s Problem”.

item.title: bayestraitr
item.description: I’ve been using BayesTraits for the last year or so, and had developed a package to make it easy to create data for BayesTraits and to read the output into R - called bayestraitr.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Savage, P. E., Passmore, S., Chiba, G., Currie, T. E., Suzuki, H.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Guide to Thumbnails in Hugo
item.description: Thumbnails can be enabled easily by setting the thumbnail parameter in the frontmatter to an image such as "images/landscape.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Sam Passmore. I’m a Postdoctoral researcher with Pat Savage’s CompMusic Lab (CompMusic is for comparative and computational approaches to the study of music) at Keio University in Japan.

item.title: Cultured Scene
item.description: I wrote a piece for the December issue of Cultured Scene!

item.title: Sookias, Passmore, and Atkinson (2018) - News coverage
item.description: A paper I published with Roland Sookias and Quentin Atkinson was covered in the news!
